amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, an additional $5,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation, Army, for High Energy Laser-Low Aspect Target Tracking.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4450 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4450 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To provide, with an offset, an additional $5,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation, Army, for High Energy Laser-Low Aspect Target Tracking.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4450 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4450 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici.
